ambassadors: Сообщество коллег-преподавателей и исследователей

The 'Сообщество коллег-преподавателей и исследователей' (Community of Colleagues-Teachers and Researchers) embodies the collective nature of professional associations, promoting collaboration, knowledge sharing, and mutual support among professionals in the field of education and research. Unlike individual entities like students or teachers, this community represents a network that aligns closely with the values and agenda of professional associations.

data.essentiality: Institutional policies create the framework and guidelines within which the facilitator operates, ensuring compliance and legitimacy.
